text: The Sacrifice is a 1909 American silent drama movie directed by D. W. GriffithThe SacrificeMelvyn Stokes. D.W. Griffith's the Birth of a Nation and stars Harry Solter, Florence Lawrence, and Linda Arvidson. ==Actors== * Harry Solter as Mr. Hardluck * Florence Lawrence as Mrs. Hardluck * Linda Arvidson as At Wigmakers * John R. Cumpson as At Jewelers * George Gebhardt as At Jewelers / At Pawnshop * Arthur V. Johnson as At Wigmakers * Marion Leonard as At Wigmakers * Owen Moore * Mack Sennett as At Wigmakers / At Jewelers / At Pawnshop ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1909 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: The Sacrifice (1909 movie)
